page.title: 11OUR GAMES
page.content: In Summer time we enjoy playing out with our friends.We play on parks, playing fields and streets.Boys enjoy sports such as cricket and football and riding B.M.X bikes.These are special bikes which we use for doing stunts. We ride on one wheel and jump from ramps. Roller states are popular with girl. They are special boots with wheels and you can skate very fast on them. Girls also enjoy Sports like netball and rounders. At our school at the moment our favourite game is marbles.In Winter we sledge and throw snowballs.In Winter and Summer lots of children go swimming at the swimming baths .Indoors most children watch a lot of television.Lots of people have videos and they hre films or tape them to watch in their spare time.Half our class own computers and enjoy playing computer games.
